entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:54 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Snow level lowering to 1000 metres near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:54 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
